page.title: 20CREDITS
page.content:
Too many people were involved in this survey to name them individually.
These pages were compiled by pupils of{Lasswade Primary School}and {Lasswade High School Centre.}
Data processing for computer and media surveys were done by 'O' grade Computing students.
The land cover details were processed by 'O' grade Geography students.
(The complete media survey was published in the{'Media Education {Journal' No4, February 1986,}published the Association for Media Education in Scotland and Comedia)
